title: Patricia Breen Mid-Century Santa Ornament
description:
Santa's white robe features bright packages under stylized trees festively embellished with light-catching, hand-applied crystals.  Plus, the Christmas tree mobile he carries not only looks like a piece of modern art, it actually moves!  The glistening mouth-blown glass is hand-painted and hand-silvered in artist Patricia Breen's studio in Poland.

  • Dimensions: 6 x 3.375 in.
  • Materials: Glass, Austrian crystals.
  • Hand painted, silvered.
  • Made in Poland.

*Please note: Discounts and promotional pricing do not apply.
